title: AI Data Governance Standard
description: This standard defines requirements for AI training, validation, and testing datasets to ensure they meet quality, relevance, representativeness, and bias mitigation standards in compliance with EU AI Act Article 10.

kpis.name: Data Quality Requirements Coverage
kpis.definition: % of AI systems with documented quality requirements
kpis.measurementMethod: (# AI systems with requirements / # total AI systems) × 100

kpis.name: Bias Assessment Coverage
kpis.definition: % of high-risk AI with bias assessment
kpis.measurementMethod: (# high-risk AI with bias assessment / # high-risk AI) × 100

kpis.name: Fairness Metric Compliance
kpis.definition: % of AI systems meeting fairness thresholds
kpis.measurementMethod: (# AI systems meeting thresholds / # total AI systems) × 100

kpis.name: Lineage Completeness
kpis.measurementMethod: (# datasets with complete lineage / # total datasets) × 100

kpis.name: Data Minimization Compliance
kpis.definition: % of AI systems with minimization assessment
kpis.measurementMethod: (# AI systems with assessment / # total AI systems) × 100

kpis.name: Privacy Protection Coverage
kpis.definition: % of personal data with privacy protection
kpis.measurementMethod: (# datasets with protection / # datasets with personal data) × 100

kpis.name: Data Catalog Completeness
kpis.definition: % of datasets in catalog with all mandatory fields

kpis.name: Quality Issue Resolution Time
kpis.definition: Average days to resolve quality issues
